Package de.oth.blocklib

Main classes of the library. Consists of a configuration class and the game class itself. Everything starts here
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameWindow.ResizeListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssetManager
    Used to load and keep track of assets located in the res-folder
    Configuration
    An instance of Configuration allows the framework to specify properties.
    Context
    A Singleton that stores references to important "managing" objects.
    ContextFactory
    Creates the context for the game
    Game
    This class defines the game loop and holds instances of every class.
    GameStateManager
    For increasing complexity, a event system might be better.
    GameWindow
    This class represents the game window which is visible on the screen.
    SerializationTest4delete
    Test out stream compression
    WorldInteraction
    Used to interact with the World For Example: setting, removing stones
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ContextType  
    GameState  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    GameWindow.WindowException
